message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential benefits for someone with your interests, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,400,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer is closer to the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,325,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm proposing $1,225,000. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway.  To show my good faith, I'm willing to accept a slight compromise. My final offer is $1,275,000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go slightly lower, so I'm proposing $1,200,000. Can you consider this offer?
